title: How can i get PBE account ?

embed.description: DONATE link: https://www.gamingforgood.net/s/vandiril#donate You can also support me using SUPER CHAT. RULES: Be nice no toxic no spam english pls. I am 24, I am from Poland and my name is Lucas. Spamming JD or anything like that is bannable, thanks!

body: Can i get this PBE ? I just wanna test PBE ,cuz im tired to play EUNE just rankeds . I wanna URF and use all skins and champs.{{champion:412}}

replies.body: For the time being, [**PBE signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are closed for maintenance. They're working on making the process easier for players and smoother on our end, and you can check that status page for updates.
Cho Gath Is Rly Strong Will You Nerf Him?
